meaning list.sentence translation: Yillar davomida bir ishda ishlagandan so'ng, o'zgarish vaqti keldi.

word: time heals all wounds (or time is a great healer)

meaning list.sentence: Don’t worry; time heals all wounds.
meaning list.sentence translation: Xavotir olmang; Vaqt hamma narsani davolaydi.

meaning list.sentence: Let’s not waste time; time is money.
meaning list.sentence translation: Keling, vaqtni behuda o'tkazmaylik; Vaqt qimmatlidir.

meaning list.sentence: Time is of the essence, so we need to act quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vaqt juda muhim, shuning uchun biz tezda harakat qilishimiz kerak.

meaning list.sentence: We had the time of our lives on our vacation.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ta'tilda hayotimizning eng yaxshi vaqtlarini o'tkazdik.

meaning list.sentence: Now that he’s retired, he has time on his hands.
meaning list.sentence translation: Endi nafaqaga chiqqani uchun uning vaqti ko‘p.

meaning list.meaning: Hayajon yoki xijolat tufayli gapira olmaslik (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: He was tongue-tied during the interview.
meaning list.sentence translation: Suhbat davomida hayajondan gapira olmadi.

word: too many chiefs and not enough Indians
phonetic american: tuː ˈmɛni tʃiːfs ənd nɑːt ɪˈnʌf ˈɪndiənz
phonetic british: tuː ˈmɛni tʃiːfs ənd nɒt ɪˈnʌf ˈɪndiənz

meaning list.meaning: Rahbarlar juda ko'p, lekin xodimlar etarli emas (idiyom)
meaning list.sentence: The project failed because there were too many chiefs and not enough Indians.
meaning list.sentence translation: Loyiha muvaffaqiyatsizlikka uchradi, chunki rahbarlar juda ko'p, ammo xodimlar etarli emas edi.

word: too much (free) time on one's hands
phonetic american: tuː mʌtʃ taɪm ɑn wʌnz hændz
phonetic british: tuː mʌtʃ taɪm ɒn wʌnz hændz

meaning list.meaning: Ko'p bo'sh vaqtga ega bo'lish va uni behuda o'tkazish (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: He started spreading rumors because he has too much time on his hands.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bo‘sh vaqti ko‘p bo‘lgani uchun g‘iybat tarqata boshladi.

meaning list.sentence: He’s the top banana in the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: U kompaniya rahbari hisoblanadi.

meaning list.sentence: After winning the competition, he became the top dog in his field.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tanlovda g‘olib chiqqanidan so‘ng u o‘z sohasining eng kuchli shaxsiga aylandi.

meaning list.meaning: Qiyin vaziyatlarni hal qila oladigan kuchli odam (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: She’s a tough cookie; she never gives up.
meaning list.sentence translation: U qiyin vaziyatlarga bardosh bera oladigan kuchli shaxs; U hech qachon taslim bo'lmaydi.

meaning list.meaning: Ishda ishlatiladigan maxsus bilim yoki usullar (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: He learned the tricks of the trade from his mentor.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ustozidan kasbning nozik jihatlarini o‘rgandi.

meaning list.meaning: Birovning haqiqiy xarakterini yoki niyatlarini ko'rsatish (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: She showed her true colours when she refused to help.
meaning list.sentence translation: U yordam berishdan bosh tortganida o'zining haqiqiy qiyofasini ko'rsatdi.

word: turn back the hands of time
phonetic american: tɜːrn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm
phonetic british: tɜːn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm

meaning list.meaning: O'tmishga qaytish yoki vaqtni orqaga qaytarish (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vaqtni orqaga qaytara olsam, boshqacha qaror qilgan bo'lardim.

meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: U universitetda o‘qimagan, lekin hamma narsani hayotdan o‘rgangan.

meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: Siz abadiy kutishingiz mumkin, lekin men fikrimni o'zgartirmayman.

meaning list.meaning: biror narsa behuda ketadi yoki muvaffaqiyatsiz bo'ladi (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: Loyiha bekor qilinganda barcha mehnatlarimiz barbod bo‘ldi.

meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: U o'zini isbotlash uchun fursat kutmoqda.

meaning list.meaning: kimnidir tashlab ketmoq yoki ko‘nglini qoldirmoq (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vaziyat qiyinlashganda, u oilasini tashlab ketdi.

meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: Biz ahamiyatsiz mavzularni muhokama qilish uchun vaqtni behuda sarflaymiz.

meaning list.sentence: The team works like a well-oiled machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jamoa muammosiz ishlaydigan tizim kabi ishlaydi.

meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: Biz istirohat bog'ida ajoyib vaqt o'tkazdik.

meaning list.meaning: Qo'rquv yoki kasallikdan juda oqarib ketish (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bu xabarni eshitib, rangi oqarib ketdi.

meaning list.meaning: ofis xodimi, aqliy ish bilan shug'ullanadigan kishi (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Oq yoqali ishlar shaharlarda keng tarqalgan.

meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Stadion qimmat, ammo shahar uchun foydasiz sarmoya bo'lib chiqdi.

meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Uning his-tuyg'ularini ranjitmaslik uchun u ozgina yolg'on gapirdi.

meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kompaniya janjalni yashirishga harakat qildi.

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ular ziyofat uyushtirganda, ular bezak va oziq-ovqat bilan chiqishadi.

meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Men sizning ziyofatingizga katta hayajon bilan kelaman!

meaning list.meaning: Oxirgi kelgan kishiga beriladigan mukofot yoki unvon (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ular ligada oxirgi bo'lgani uchun yog'och qoshiq mukofotini olishdi.

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ushbu yangi tozalash vositasi mukammal ishlaydi.

meaning list.meaning: Men hech qachon bunday qilmagan bo'lardim yoki vaziyatga tushmasdim (idoma)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Men hech qachon bunday kiyimni kiymayman.

meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ular har yili bir xil plyajga tashrif buyurishadi.

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: U xo'jayiniga qarshi turish uchun juda qo'rqoq.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: Eski odatlari bo'lgan odamni o'zgartirish qiyin (ideoma)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: U smartfondan foydalanishni o'rganishdan bosh tortadi; Eski odatlarni o'zgartirish qiyin.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Men ham bilmayman, ikkala taxminimiz ham bir xil darajada to'g'ri bo'lishi mumkin (idioma)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nega poyezd kechikdi? Men ham bilmayman.
